usage.cn: 我放下了尊严，放下了个性，放下了固执，都只是因为放不下你。
usage.eng: I put down my dignity,personality and obstinacy for the sake of you who I can't put down.

usage.cn: 君子并非定要远庖厨，做汉堡也不意味着折损尊严。你的祖父母对之另有解释，他们将之称为机遇。
usage.eng: Flipping burgers is not beneath your dignity. Your grandparents had a different word for burger flipping - they called it opportunity.
